doc:
John Patrick Lowrie https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Patrick_Lowrie 0 John Patrick Lowrie (born June 28, 1952 in Honolulu, Hawaii) is an American voice actor, actor, musician and author best known for voicing the Sniper in Team Fortress 2 and various characters in Dota 2. He has played Sherlock Holmes on the radio dramas The Classic Adventures of Sherlock Holmes and The Further Adventures of Sherlock Holmes (Imagination Theater, Jim French Productions) longer than any other actor in history, including Basil Rathbone. John_Patrick_Lowrie ( born June_28_,_1952 in Honolulu , Hawaii ) is an_American_voice_actor , actor , musician_and_author best_known for voicing the_Sniper in Team_Fortress_2 and various_characters in Dota_2 . He has_played Sherlock_Holmes on the_radio_dramas The_Classic_Adventures of Sherlock_Holmes and The_Further_Adventures of Sherlock_Holmes_(_Imagination_Theater , Jim_French_Productions ) longer than any_other_actor in history , including Basil_Rathbone .
